title: Aurelion Sol's passive...

replies.body: Aurelion Sol really needs to put the passive on W and make a new passive aside from that I like the rest of his kit. Although the ulti could be changed....
I think having a passive damage ability is pretty unique and cool

Yea it is definitely just feels like it should work the same but placed on W but i updated my thoughts 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/EeZJAe13-aurelion-sol-feels-great-however-i-feel-like-it-could-improve-a-few-points
Well, his entire kit revolves around the ability, so it makes sense for him to have it as his total passive
Yea that's why having projectile speed increase per level would be more fun than them fusing passive onto W and making a new passive.
It also would apply Deathfire Touch and Thunderlords.
I can see him viably running either, which is something that a lot of mages cannot reasonably claim. So at least that's nice.
